data.title: Customize your wah wonton soup order.  They are happy to oblige!
data.text: I have ordered frequently from Golden China, mostly take out.  They are always friendly and accommodating to your every needs.  I am very allergic to shellfish and I state that with each order.  They have now put my name in a notebook so whenever I order in the future, just tell them to check the book. Very pleased!

data.title: Delicious, Quality Chinese Cuisine!
data.text:
The food was amazing and made me wish that I weren't on vacation so that I could reheat my wonderful leftovers properly!
Truly quality Chinese cuisine - it's so hard to find food created this well and with so much care!
The wait staff was incredibly attentive and polite.
I had an amazing experience here!
Thank you for the wonderful meal!

data.title: Authentic asain food!
data.text: We also come here maybe once every two weeks. We tend to always get honey walnut chicken, chow fun, and pick an item like kung pow. All delish!!! Also the egg soup is better than the sweet and sour but thats just our preferance. I do wish they would fix up the restroom so it can really make this place all around great! The food is resonable. We really enjoy this place. Lunch speciala are great value, large portions!
